text: Oleksandr Sydorenko (27 May 1960 – 20 February 2022), also known as Aleksandr Sidorenko, was an individual medley swimmer. He won a gold medal at the 400 m individual medley at the 1980 Summer Olympics in Moscow. Sydorenko died in Mariupol, Ukraine on 20 February 2022 from COVID-19, aged 61.В Мариуполе умер олимпийский чемпион по плаванию ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Ukrainian sportspeople Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Ukrainian swimmers Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Ukraine
title: Oleksandr Sydorenko
